lead_paragraph: BECK--Joel Isaac, born in Buffalo, NY to Seymore and Marcel Beck. Received his PhD and taught philosophy at the University of Chicago. He was the Residence Director at The Bridge, NYC, 11 years. Beloved therapist, supervisor, teacher, writer. Survived by his children, Katrina and Sam, sister Beth and four grandchildren. His contribution to psychoanalysis and philosophy will continue in the lives he touched. Service 2pm Sunday at "The Riverside" 76 Street and Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
